nodes.text: The Zygia system was located in the Manda sector, a part of the Slice portion of the Mid Rim. The hyperlane known as the Manda Merchant Route linked it to the Holess system as well as the Thoran system in the Bothan sector.

The Zygia system shared its name with the Zygian Savings and Loan, a bank located on Treylon II in the Colonies, as well as its branch on the Outer Rim Territories planet Tatooine, the Zygian's Banking Concern.
The Zygia system was established in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square R-14.
